title: HOW TO GROW YOUR HAIR LONGER WITH CELEBRITY STYLIST TOMMY BUCKETT + GARNIER FRUCTIS | 24/7 STYLE
description:
From strengthening with Garnier Fructis Grow Strong haircare to avoiding heat damage, celebrity stylist Tommy Buckett shares his top products and tips for getting longer hair. 

1. Use a fortifying shampoo and conditioner
2. Prevent heat damage by avoiding hot tools
3. Use Grow Strong Mask once a week
4. Get your hair trimmed every 6 weeks

asset.author: GarnierUSA

transcripts: hey guys and Tommy bucket celebrity stylist at garnier fructis and today I'm going to share some tricks and tips of the trade just for you. So one of the top questions i get from celebrities editors and clients is how do i get my hair to grow longer? Here's some tips number one use a fortifying shampoo and conditioner the second tip avoid all heat that includes tools blow-dryers, flat irons, curly irons, hot rollers anything it really damages the ends and dries the ends of the hair out the third is used grow strong mask once a week with serramin it makes the hair 10 times stronger and the fourth one I would say is see your hairdresser every six weeks for a trim just to keep the dust off the ends so while hair is growing out it stays nice and strong.
